title: Help Center

faq1.question: How do I reset my password?
faq1.answer: Go to settings and select 'Reset Password'. You will receive instructions via email to complete the process.

faq2.question: How do I report an issue with my rental?
faq2.answer: Navigate to your rental details page and click on 'Report Issue'. Fill out the form with details about the problem, and our team will respond shortly.

faq3.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faq3.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and mobile payment solutions like Apple Pay and Google Pay. Visit the payments section for more details.

emergencySupport: For emergency issues, please call our 24/7 hotline
